name: NSViewAnimation
desc: An animation of an app's views, limited to changes in frame location and size, and to fade-in and fade-out effects.

items.name: init(viewAnimations: [[NSViewAnimation.Key : Any]])
items.desc: Returns an NSViewAnimation object initialized with the supplied information.

items.name: var viewAnimations: [[NSViewAnimation.Key : Any]]
items.desc: The dictionaries defining the objects to animate.

items.name: struct NSViewAnimation.Key
items.desc: The following string constants are keys for the dictionaries in the array passed into init(viewAnimations:) and viewAnimations.

items.name: struct NSViewAnimation.EffectName
items.desc: The following constants specify the animation effect to apply and are used as values for the animation effect property of the animation view. See the description of effect for usage details.
